short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arablex is a virtual keyboard which allow people to write in arabic on any website, and it transforms latin alphabets to arabic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arablex simplifies Arabic writing for everyone, eliminating the need to switch languages or visit external sites for Latin-to-Arabic transformation or translation. With Arablex, effortless Arabic text input becomes seamless, enhancing user convenience across various websites.
